name: Rip Pair
description:
This is an experiment made for Global Game Jam 2020. Our team in Bristol decided to play with the concept of "repairing" by using a pair of axolotls that can rip their limbs off and give them to the other character in order to solve puzzles. Due to time constraints, even with the limb tearing system being completely functional, is not used.
